item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>I may become a CHAMPION cook as I have just tried to book my birthday present!! and have chosen "French Bistro Cooking" on 6th Feb. Hope I do get on it and you can taste the results!</p>
item.content:encoded: I may become a CHAMPION cook as I have just tried to book my birthday present!! and have chosen “French Bistro Cooking” on 6th Feb. Hope I do get on it and you can taste the results!

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>glad you got home safe Matthew, hope that your Waitrose shopping lived up to its reputation!</p>
item.content:encoded: glad you got home safe Matthew, hope that your Waitrose shopping lived up to its reputation!
